Asyik Pesta Miras, Puluhan Pelajar di Grebek Pol PP
04 Nov 2019, 14:01 by Haerul Mulku Wataullah



Asyik Pesta Miras, Puluhan Pelajar di Grebek Pol PP



Asyik Pesta Miras, Puluhan Pelajar di Grebek Pol PP


KBRN, Baubau : Aksi kejar-kejaran antara petugas Satuan Polisi Pamong Praja (Satpol PP) Kota Baubau, Sulawesi Tenggara (Sultra) dengan pelajar kembali terjadi pada Senin (4/11/2019).Aksi kejar-kejaran itu berawal saat Pol PP melakukan penggrebekan usai menerima laporan dari masyarakat dan Lurah setempat.Kabid Ketertiban Umum dan Ketentraman Masyarakat, Satpol PP Kota Baubau, Muh Husni Ganiru kepada RRI menuturkan keberadaan anak sekolah yang didominasi anak dibawah umur dan berkumpul di belakang salah satu sekolah negeri disekitar Kelurahan Lipu itu sudah sangat meresahkan masyarakat sekitar.Karena merasa terganggu lanjut Husni, masyarakat pun mengadukannya kepada Lurah setempat. Dengan sigap Lurah  melaporkannya ke Satpol PP agar ditertibkan.Atas laporan itu Satpol PP menerjunkan personel di lokasi dan benar setiba disana di dapatkan sedikitnya puluhan lebih siswa tengah berkumpul sambil menenggak miras jenis arak, beberapa diantranya juga terlihat siswa perempuan.  Aksi kejar-kejaran dengan petugaspun tak terhindarkan, para siswa pun berhamburan melarikan diri.Namun sayangnya  dari penggrebekan itu tambah Husni hanya 11 pelajar yang berhasil di amankan beberapa diantaranya siswa SMP kelas VII, kemudian langsung digiring ke Kantor Satpol PP untuk diinterogasi, sementra lainnya yang sebagian besar siswa SMA berhasil meloloskan diri."Saya tadi menerima laporan bahwa ada sekelompok pelajar berkumpul dan meminum minuman keras di belakang sekolah di Kelurahan Lipu dan kami segera menuju lokasi," jelas Muhammad Husni Ganiru.Husni mengatakan razia anak sekolah selama jam belajar terus dilakukan sebagai langkah pencegahan terjadinya hal-hal yang tidak diinginkan, seperti tawuran dan mengganggu ketertiban masyarakat."Ini juga sebagai tindak lanjut kerja sama kami dengan pihak dinas pendidikan dan kebudayaan Kota Baubau dan Kantor Cabang Dinas Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Propinsi Sultra Rayon Baubau-Buton Selatan untuk menertibkan anak sekolah yang keluyuran di luar sekolah saat jam belajar," imbuhnya.Dalam aksi itu Satpol PP berhasil mengamankan barang bukti (BB) sisa miras  yang diminum para pelajar. Selain itu HP para siswa pun ikut diperiksa dan beberapa diantaranya menyimpan video berkonten dewasa.Husni sangat menyayangkan hal ini dan dirinya mengimbau kepada orang tua mapupun pihak sekolah agar lebih mengawasi anak didiknya agar hal serupa tidak terjadi kembali.

Fun Miras Party, Dozens of Students at Grebek Pol PP
Nov 04 2019, 14:01 by Haerul Mulku Wataullah



Fun Miras Party, Dozens of Students at Grebek Pol PP



Fun Miras Party, Dozens of Students at Grebek Pol PP


KBRN, Baubau: Chase action between officers of the Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP) of the City of Baubau, Southeast Sulawesi (Southeast Sulawesi) with students resumed on Monday (4/11/2019). The chase action began when Pol PP conducted the raid was after receiving reports from the community and the local Lurah. The Public Order and Public Peace Sub-District Head, Baubau City Satpol PP, Muh Husni Ganiru told RRI that the existence of school children dominated by minors and gathered behind one of the public schools around the Lipu Village unsettling the surrounding community. Because of being disturbed further Husni, the community also complained to the local village chief. The Lurah readily reported it to the Satpol PP to be put in order. On the report, the Satpol PP fielded personnel at the location and it was true that when he arrived there at least tens of students were gathered while drinking alcoholic beverages, some of them were also seen by female students. Romping with officers was inevitable, the students rushed to flee. But unfortunately from the raid added Husni only 11 students were successfully secured, some of them VII grade junior high school students, then immediately escorted to the PP Satpol Office for interrogation, while others were "Most of the high school students managed to escape." I had received a report that there was a group of students gathered and drinking liquor behind the school in the Lipu Kelurahan and we immediately headed to the location, "explained Muhammad Husni Ganiru. Husni said the raids of school children during the study hours continued to be carried out as a step to prevent the occurrence of things that are not desirable, such as brawl and disturbing public order. "This is also a follow-up to our cooperation with the education and culture department of the City of Baubau and the Branch Office of the Education and Culture Office of the Province of South Sulawesi Rayon Baubau-South Buton for bring order to school children who wander outside the school during study hours, "he added. In the action Satpol PP managed to secure evidence (BB) of the remaining alcohol that students drank. In addition, the students' cellphones were also examined and some of them kept videos of adult content. Hushni regretted this and he appealed to parents and even the school to better supervise their students so that similar things did not happen again.
